titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 13th Annual National Association of Letter Carriers Food Drive.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 5/10/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates the members of the National Association of Letter Carriers for their hard work on behalf of the millions of people who go hungry each day and encourages the people of the United States to follow the example of such members by donating food to local food banks and participating in the National Association of Letter Carriers Food Drive on May 14, 2005, by placing nonperishable food by their mailboxes.
